name: 5-in-1 CO2 Carbon Dioxide Detector, Dienmern Portable Air Quality Monitor Indoor, 1600mAh Powerful Battery CO2 Monitor for CO2/Temp/Humidity, LED Display CO2 Detector for Travel/Office/Home/Grow Tents
short_description: 【CO2 monitor】 This CO2 monitor keeps track of CO2, AQI, temperature, and humidity in real time. It’s made to give you clear, easy-to-read info at a glance, so you can stay on top of your indoor air quality and keep your space healthier and more comfortable.

【Swiss-Made High-Precision CO2 Sensor】 Built with a Swiss-made CO2 Sensor, this air quality tester gives you highly accurate CO2 readings every second. With a wide detection range of 400–5000 ppm and accuracy of ±50 ppm, it keeps you informed of changes in your air. Plus, the added temperature and humidity sensors provide complete indoor monitoring for a healthier environment.

【Life-Saving CO2 Alarm】 This smart CO2 detector helps protect you from hidden dangers like gas leaks, wildfire smoke, or poor ventilation. The moment CO2 levels climb above safe limits, it sounds a loud alarm right away—so you have time to react and keep your loved ones safe

【Built-in 1600mAh Battery】 With a built-in 1600mAh lithium battery, this air quality monitor can run for up to 72 hours on a single charge. It supports USB charging and is lightweight enough to carry around, while also perfect for keeping in one spot at home or the office.

【Smart Visual Display】 This indoor air quality monitor comes with a bright LED screen that shows CO2, AQI, temperature, and humidity in real time. The clear visuals and high contrast make it easy to read at a glance, anytime—day or night—so you always know what the air around you is like.

【Necessity of Air Quality Monitoring】Low levels of carbon dioxide detector are generally harmless, but when the concentration exceeds a certain limit, it can affect breathing in humans and other living organisms. In severe cases, it can even become life-threatening. Therefore, monitoring CO2 levels in the air is essential for maintaining a healthy environment.

【Note】Dear customer, just a heads-up: CO2 meters can have a little variation of around ±50 ppm. That’s simply because each CO2 meter uses a different sensor, so the readings might not be exactly the same. Thanks for your patience and understanding.

name: 4-in-1 Natural Gas Leak Detector & Carbon Monoxide Detectors with Natural, Propane, Co & Gas Leak Detector - Carbon Monoxide Detectors Plug in -Temperature & Humidity Detectors for Home, RV (2 Packs)
short_description: 【2 Packs 4-IN-1 Detection System】This enhanced 4-in-1 Natural Gas Leak Detector & Carbon Monoxide Detector combines natural gas detection, carbon monoxide sensing, temperature monitoring, and humidity measurement. Featuring dual-sensor technology and a reinforced alert mechanism, it delivers rapid environmental analysis and comprehensive protection for household security through multi-dimensional hazard prevention.

【Instant Alert Technology】RV carbon monoxide detector system activates visual and auditory warnings (≥85dB) when detecting critical thresholds (CO levels ≥150PPM / gas density ≥5%LEL). Flashing crimson indicators paired with piercing alerts ensure immediate threat recognition, enabling swift emergency response to safeguard loved ones in residential and mobile environments.

【Energy-Efficient Operation】Designed with sustainability, this US-standard plug adapter supports 110V-220V AC power with ultra-low standby consumption (≤2W). Its advanced electronic sensor technology eliminates frequent maintenance through extended operational longevity, offering an eco-conscious solution that reduces both energy waste and replacement costs.

【Bright LCD & Space-Saving Build】Features a bright LCD color display for easy reading of gas levels in real time, Detects carbon monoxide (0-2000 PPM) and natural gas (0-10% LEL). Compact design fits seamlessly in homes, RVs, hotels, and cruise cabins without taking up space.

【Initialization Guidelines】Allow 180-second environmental calibration post-installation. Conduct system verification through the manual test button to confirm alarm functionality. For optimal measurement precision, let the device stabilize thermally for 30 minutes before relying on humidity/temperature readings, ensuring sensor accuracy through proper thermal equilibrium.

name: Kidde Carbon Monoxide Detector, Battery Powered CO Alarm with LEDs, Test-Reset Button, Low Battery Indicator, Portable
short_description: Electrochemical sensor technology detects CO gas
Easy installation, no wiring needed, detects during a power failure by operating on 2-AA batteries (included); Install on a wall of your home or place on a tabletop
Green LED indicates power to the carbon monoxide detector, while an 85-decibel alarm & a red LED indicates the presence of carbon monoxide
Event Memory records the last time carbon monoxide was detected or when the unit was last tested
product_description: The Kidde Carbon Monoxide Detector, Battery Powered CO Alarm with LEDs, Test-Reset Button, Low Battery Indicator, Portable, model 9CO5LP2, is a carbon monoxide detector that uses electrochemical sensor technology to detect carbon monoxide. The CO detector is powered by 2-AA alkaline batteries located in the back of the unit, providing easy installation & no wiring, plus coverage during a power failure. The alarm is conveniently designed and portable enough for travel - simply install it on a wall or place it on a tabletop. When carbon monoxide is detected, an 85-decibel alarm will sound & a red LED will flash. A green LED indicates that the alarm is receiving power. The test-hush button allows you to test the battery operations as well as temporarily silence the low battery chirp warning. Install a smoke detector & carbon monoxide detector on every level of your home and near bedrooms to help keep your family safe from fire & poisonous gas. UL Certified with a 10-year limited manufacturer's warranty.

name: Amazon Smart Air Quality Monitor – Know your air, Works with Alexa
short_description: Know your air – Amazon Smart Air Quality Monitor makes it easy to understand what’s in your indoor air.
Track and measure – Keep tabs on 5 key factors: particulate matter (PM 2.5), volatile organic compounds (VOCs), carbon monoxide (CO), humidity, and temperature.
Stay informed – Get an indication of current air quality from the color-coded LED, and an easy-to-understand air quality score in the Alexa app anytime.
Get notifications – If Alexa detects poor air quality, you can get notifications on your phone or even announcements on Echo devices.
Enable Routines to turn your Alexa-enabled devices such as air purifiers, dehumidifiers, and fans on and off when the indoor air quality changes.
Maximize comfort - Keep different areas of your home more comfortable using the built-in temperature sensor with the Amazon Smart Thermostat
Create your Alexa+ home: With Alexa+, set routines using just your voice, control multiple devices at once, and chat casually to make requests.
